item.title: Train theme park to enjoy various train rides, Samcheok High One Chuo Park - Samcheok-si, Gangwon-do, Korea
item.description:
High One Chuchu Park Chuchu Station

Train theme park to enjoy various train rides, Samcheok High One Chuo Park

Samcheok-si, Gangwon-do, Korea

The train theme park, Samcheok High, where you can ride a variety of trains, including the Swiss mountain train incline train, the nation's fastest rail coaster, a mini train that takes a miniature train that scales down the world's most famous trains, and a switchback to increase the altitude by moving forward and backward. It is a two-day, one-night trip to Conechu Park.

Swiss Mountain Train Encline Train and Rail Coaster
In 1939, the railroad was built to overcome the altitude difference between Sampok-si's Simpo-ri and Taebaek-si's Tongli and operate the train. It was a way to raise the train with wire rope. A wire rope was installed on the sloping railroad at 15.6 degrees and the train was raised. People had to walk on foot to reduce the weight of the train. When people came and went frequently, there was also a bearer who took the elderly on the road and climbed the road.
Incline Train
The Gangsak railway was demolished in 1963. Recently, this section was restored, and the mountain train of Jungfrau, Switzerland, began operating. From Chuchu Station Incline Train Station to Sky Station, the average speed is about 5km per hour, and it takes about 20 minutes. (Currently the incline train is suspended. Normal operation will be announced on the website later.)
View from the rail coaster boarding area
Sky Station is located at 720 meters above sea level. You can capture the magnificent greatness of Baekdu-daegan at a glance when you stand at the observation deck.
Rail Coaster
After enjoying the view from the observation deck, ride the rail coaster. The rail coaster is a rail bike that descends a hill at a maximum speed of 25 km / h.
Rail Coaster
There are 12 tunnels in this section, and you can see the light and sculptures created with different themes for each tunnel. Among them, the image of the tunnel composed of large watch weights and clock sound remains strong. In the tunnel, it seems to move to the time of the tunnel, not the time of the world, to lead the traveler to a new imaginary world. There are tunnels that increase tension with the sound of lightning and light, or where trees are shaped with optical fibers, etc., you can feel the atmosphere of a fantasy forest. You will enjoy the 7.7km section to the arrival point for about 25 minutes.
The rail coaster passes through 12 tunnels
Children's favorite mini train
Once you have enjoyed the view from Sky Station on the Incline Train and then came down to Chuchu Park on the rail coaster, it's time to enjoy the mini trains that kids love.
Mini train steam train
The mini train is a miniature train made by shrinking famous trains from the UK, Japan, and Russia to 1/8 of the actual size. A small train rides around the 700m section of Chuchu Park, which children love, especially with two steam trains and two electric trains, but currently only electric trains. The time required is about 7-10 minutes.
Steam train on the left, electric train on the right
Miniature sculptures are installed throughout the mini-train section. I feel like I'm in a small country by looking at the small train as well as the mini train.
Mini train next to the ecological pond
A variety of character photo zones are popular, where you can stick out your face and take pictures. If you are with children, you can spend a long time on the mini train.
Mini train is running around the course
Switchback train running to the crossroads

In accordance with the name of the train theme park, there is also a switchback train in Chuchu Park. A switchback is a railroad train that is shaped like a strip to operate a train on a sloping section of a mountainous area. Repeat the forward and reverse steps to increase altitude.

Switchback train
In Korea, there was a switchback railroad between Heungjeon Station and Doohan Station in Gangwon-do. In 2012, a tunnel to replace the switchback section was opened, and no trains were allowed in this section. Chuchu Park operates a switchback train in that section. The switchback train is composed of a presidential carriage, a stove carriage, and so on, providing a different atmosphere for each carriage. The round trip from Chuchu Station to Nahanjeong Station takes about 80 minutes.
Switchback railway line
Take the switchback train to Nahanjeong Station and stop for 20 minutes. At this time, tourists can browse the gallery at Nahanjeong Station, enjoy the scenery of the old town around history, or use a pump-type trolley or a pedal-type trolley.
The switchback train is passing Nahanjeong Station
Theme accommodation
There are four types of accommodation in Chuchu Park. First, 15 villas in the form of private villas and 7 cube cubes with grass on the roof. Both facilities are a comfortable place for families. Trainville, a train accommodation, has eight rooms. Up to 3 people per room. Since you are at the train theme park, it is also a good idea to sleep overnight in Trainville. An auto camping site with 31 sites is also operated for campers.
Natureville
There is also a food station where you can eat. In summer, guests can enjoy swimming in the mini-pool. On the main square of Chuchu Station, a fountain show is held with LED lights.
Cubeville
After staying overnight at Chuchu Park, it is okay to visit a nearby beauty waterfall the next day. The road from Chuchu Park to Miin Falls was not maintained. You can take a car to Tongli and go from Tongli to the beautiful waterfall.
Trainville
At the beginning of a mountain road to Miin Falls, you pull a car and fold into the mountain road. If you go down a steep mountain path, you have to go through a small temple to reach the beauty waterfall. A passing box was placed at the passage of the temple, and the phrase “Insert 1,000 won” was written to manage facilities. No one keeps it, but thinks it as a cost to manage the surroundings, and puts 1,000 won into a beautiful waterfall. It's hard to go up and down the steep downhill to the beauty waterfall, but it's worth the effort by seeing the beauty of the beauty waterfall and the symposium.
Auto camping site

Samcheok Gomchiguk, a winter delicacy that makes the nation's favorite

Samcheok-si, Gangwon-do, Korea

Sea fish called Gomchi in the East Sea, water catfish in the South Sea, and water fish in the West! The season of Gomchi caught across the coast of the Korean Peninsula has arrived. Another reason why lovers and gourmets from all over the country are waiting for the winter, heading to Samcheok, his hometown, to taste Gomchi soup, a taste of winter season.

The winter east coast is rich. This is thanks to a variety of foods that will satisfy our taste, unlike the look that looks lonely. For the same reason, gourmets and lovers from all over the country run to the east coast in winter. Start with Yangmi-ri and Guamegi in the northern part of Gangwon, and head down the east coast. Samcheok's gomchi soup with a sweet drink, gourmets' taste, and the long legs snow crab of Uljin and Yeongdeok, and Gwamegi of Pohang, are all lined up with ‘delicious things’.

Among them, if Yangmi-ri and Guamegi, and snow crab and Guamegi are 'Anju Yong', 'Gomchiguk' is 'Haejangyong' to solve all of them in one shot. However, the main character of this tour is Gomchiguk, which is relatively less known than other winter coastal delicacies.

Fish fills the East Coast of winter

Gomchi soup, as its name suggests, is a fish called Gomchi. The name of this guy caught across the coast of Korea is slightly different from coast to coast. It is called Gomchi or Water Bear in the East Sea, Water Mage or Water Catfish in the South Sea, and Jambang or Water Tumbang in the West Sea. It can be interpreted that it is as common and popular that the word for the same fish varies from coast to coast. The most familiar name for us right now is water catfish and water squirrel, among which ‘water squirrel’ is the name that fishermen who caught gomchi threw ‘tumbles’ back into the water after seeing the appearance. The appearance of Gomchi, which can never be observed, can be seen in his nickname.

However, in the Encyclopedia of Fish in the Joseon Dynasty <Jangsaebo>, Jeong Yak-jeon wrote Gomchi and said, "The taste is mild and good for the sake bottle." It wasn't that the name of Multumbung was a joke from the bosses who caricatured his ugly appearance. Or maybe it was a trick by lovers who noticed the true value of Gomchi. A name that was called ‘water bear’ or ‘gomchi’ because of its dark appearance is like a bear is also a good hint of his appearance. Some of the divers are bitter because of their ferocious nature, they are far from the appearance and personality that can be loved.

Samcheok Port's Information Board 'Today. Gomchi soup sea urchin
Nevertheless, the only thing that Gomchi is loved is because of the 'flavor'. Unlike the outrageous personality and ugly appearance, the soft flesh that melts at the tip of the tongue and the cool soup taste! The lyrics to the song “I want to see once and see twice and keep looking” are transferred to “I want to eat once and eat twice and keep eating”.
Scenery of Samcheok Port, known as the hometown of Gomchi
The texture of this fish coexists with soft flesh and slippery skin texture. The viscous part between the skin and the flesh may be unfamiliar to the newcomers, but if you are a lover, you will get used to it after you taste it twice. Those who like 'Agujjim (Aguijjim is the real name)' come up with a similar texture. At first, the slippery viscous part is awkward because it is “like a runny nose,” but sometimes they argue that they will eat each other. In the case of Samcheok Gomchi soup, which is boiled with old paper, it is easy to pass by mouth. Ah, there are differences in how to cook Gomchi soup and how it comes out.
Scenery of Samcheok Port, known as the hometown of Gomchi
Even though the names of the East, South and West Seas are different, the cool soup tastes great!

Samcheok, known as the hometown of Gomchiguk, puts old paper and boils it sharply. Served in a large soup bowl one by one. In the South Sea and West Sea area, famous for ‘Mulgigitang’, it is seasoned with radish and green onion, and boiled clearly. It is usually sold in large, medium, and small. There are also places where gomchi soup is boiled in the east sea.

<Sea Sashimi House>, known as the original home
When you go to Samcheok Port, the hometown of Gomchiguk, you will see a notice board saying 'Become Gomchiguk'. Does that mean that you have become your own body? The price of 15,000 won for a bowl (per serving) is not just as cheap. At one time, Gomchi was so common that in winter, it was a winter delicacy that residents of this town had eaten at every house. Gomchi soup, where should I taste it?
Gomchi with soft skin

In Samcheok, Gomchi's hometown, there are restaurants where you can taste Gomchi soup, such as <Sea Sashimi>, which started selling Gomchi soup for the first time, and <Geumseong Restaurant> and <Donga Restaurant>. Each restaurant has a little difference in taste, so comparing the subtle taste difference adds to the fun of the taste of “Gomchiguk”.

There are also places in pots that can be boiled
If you've tasted a bowl of Gomchi soup that was boiled and boiled with old paper, let's take a look around Samcheok Port (Jungna Port), which still embraces the scenery of the fishing village. As you walk along the breakwater in front of Samcheok Isabu Square, you can see Samcheok's blue sea in the future, and along the hillside, you can see the charming houses.
Samcheok Isabu Square, located at the base of Samcheok Port
Home-style gomchi soup, which would have been boiled in every house in front of you, will become famous. Now, as many restaurants as homes are located along Samcheok Port (Jungra Port). The experience of unwinding in a sip of cool broth is the share of lovers who ran thick the day before. When you eat, you will feel relieved at the same time as you drink again, and you will be a true sweetheart and a sip of gomchi soup. This season, where you can enjoy the taste of Gomchi soup, is important. Gomchi, which melts well and can only be tasted locally, is in the winter season from December to February.
